listings.title: Modern Student Loft
listings.description: Newly renovated apartment with modern amenities, perfect for students. Features high ceilings, large windows, and a fully equipped kitchen.

listings.title: Cozy Campus Studio
listings.description: Efficient studio apartment just steps from campus. Includes utilities and high-speed internet.

listings.title: Luxury Student Suite
listings.description: Spacious 3-bedroom apartment in a secure building with gym and study rooms. Perfect for roommates.

listings.title: Urban Student Haven
listings.description: Contemporary apartment with city views and modern furnishings. Includes in-unit laundry and parking.
